message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,200,000. It's a unique opportunity to acquire a valuable asset. I'm confident this price reflects its true worth.
I appreciate the opportunity to acquire your product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value.

Bob, I understand your perspective on the value. While $900,000 is a good starting point,  I'm willing to come down to $1,050,000 to show my commitment to this deal. This price reflects the unique features and potential of this product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $950,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value and the features of the product.

Bob, I appreciate your continued interest in the product.  I'm willing to meet you halfway again, at $975,000. This is a fair price considering the unique value of the product and our ongoing negotiations. Let's close this deal!
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $925,000, which I believe is a fair price considering the product's value and our ongoing negotiations.
